titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace, and pleasure, to confirme to his subiects their defectiue titles, estates, and possessions, (aswell by colour of former grants, as without any grant from the crowne) by his commission granted to that purpose.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation declaring His Maiesties royall grace, and pleasure, to confirme to his subiects their defectiue titles, estates, and possessions, (aswell by colour of former grants, as without any grant from the crowne) by his commission granted to that purpose.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhite-Hall this sixth day of December, in the fourth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 23; Steele notation: of yeeres 2) for Maiesties.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
